level.text: All owners and occupants of buildings authorized to receive District collection services for recyclables in accordance with ยง2010 of this chapter shall separate yard waste from household trash prior to setting it out for collection.
Yard waste that is mixed with household trash shall not be collected by DPW.
A separate collection of yard waste for owners and occupants shall occur in accordance with a schedule determined by DPW.
Yard waste shall be placed at the DPW designated point of collection for recyclables.
Yard waste shall be set out no later than 7:00 a.m. on the scheduled day of collection and no earlier than 6:30 p.m. on the day before the scheduled collection.
